scripts.compile: node_modules/.bin/tsc && echo 'âœ… Build success' || echo 'ðŸ˜¢ Build failure'
scripts.compile-and-build: npm run build-dev; npm run compile
scripts.develop: npm run compile-and-build; npm run watch
scripts.develop-fast: npm run build-dev; fswatch -0 -r ./src/ | xargs -0 -n 1 -I {} npm run build-dev
scripts.use-dev: npm run firebase -- use feedback-tool-dev; cp src/config/firebase_config_dev.ts src/config/current_config.ts
scripts.use-prod: npm run firebase -- use feedback-tool-prod; cp src/config/firebase_config_prod.ts src/config/current_config.ts
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run use-dev; npm run build-dev; npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run use-prod; npm run build-prod; npm run deploy
